entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 16 January 2023
